pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa pūgassa pariveṇavāsikā bhikkhuniyo yāguyā kilamanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.3: Atha kho so pūgo bhikkhunīnaṃ yāguatthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā aññatarassa āpaṇikassa ghare parikkhāraṃ nikkhipitvā bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.4: “amukassa, ayye, āpaṇikassa ghare yāguatthāya parikkhāro nikkhitto.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.5: Tato taṇḍule āharāpetvā yāguṃ pacāpetvā paribhuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.6: Bhikkhuniyo tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñjiṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.7: So pūgo jānitvā ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.8: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessantī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:1.15: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.12: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.14: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.17: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena mahājanikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.22: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.23: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np9:2.24: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
